title: Necromancer

properties.value: Necromancers are found just outside Shayzien as well as between Lovakengj and Arceuus. They are accompanied by zombies and dark warriors.

content:
This article is about the characters on Zeah. For character in the Necromancer Tower, see Necromancer (Necromancer Tower).

Monster ID11088

Necromancers are found just outside Shayzien as well as between Lovakengj and Arceuus. They are accompanied by zombies and dark warriors.

They attack using Magic and can use Weaken.

Contents

  • 1 Location
  • 2 Drops
    • 2.1 100%
